resources.string: This is your private, cross-platform hub for managing an endless stream of tasks.
Boost your productivity with focused bursts of work.
Manage an infinite stream of tasks without limits.
A time management method based on 25-minute stretches of focused work broken by five-minute breaks.
You can change later in the settings or add services later.
You can easily change the theme of the app to suit your preferences. The theme options fully comply with Google’s Material 3 guidelines, ensuring a consistent and accessible experience.
Here are some example task groups you can create.
Hold the task to mark it as completed
